name: Adventura Amore
description:
Adventura Amore is a Dungeons and Dragons inspired Dating Simulator.

Go on an adventure with the charming Aravaris, the calm Ebris or the brooding Wim, learn their stories and fight by their side while making your way to their final enemy!

Master the art of archery, sorcery and melee combat with three different minigames, so you may assist your friends in the battles to come.

Planned features:

  • Different enemies
  • A new party member
  • More visual and auditory feedback
  • Reworked minigames
